ReleaseNotes: Adicionados múltiplos servidores, suporte a UDP, payloads WebSocket otimizados.

payloads.name: WebSocket Upgrade (default)
payloads.payload:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: maritimavpn.shop
Connection: Upgrade
Upgrade: websocket
User-Agent: MaritimaVPN

payloads.name: WebSocket CONNECT
payloads.payload:
CONNECT %s HTTP/1.1
Host: %s
Connection: Upgrade
Upgrade: websocket
User-Agent: MaritimaVPN

payloads.name: WebSocket com SNI
payloads.payload:
GET wss://maritimavpn.shop/ HTTP/1.1
Host: maritimavpn.shop
Upgrade: websocket
Connection: Upgrade
User-Agent: MaritimaVPN
